entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , La Grande-Quatre
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:44 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 33. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 49 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 29.
